text: Glück unterwegs is a 1944 Germany-Czechoslovak musical comedy film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars O.W. Fischer, Max Gülstorff, and Kurt Hoffmann- Leydorff. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1944 films Category:German films Category:Films of Nazi Germany Category:German-language films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:German musical comedy films Category:Czechoslovak musical comedy films Category:1944 musical comedy films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films Category:German black-and-white films Category:Czechoslovak black-and-white films Category:1944 comedy films
title: Glück unterwegs
